channel.title: ::Char not saving? Help please
channel.description:
Ok when I do the command [b]::char[/b] (got it to work) it loads and all whenever I change what I look then press accept then log out and log back in IT DOESN'T SAVE IT So I look like what I was before....
[b]I noticed in freescapepkz that when you log out and log in it does save it[/b]
Sooo how do you do it? >.< Please help fast
Check my sig ;)

item.title: ::Char not saving? Help please
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

add

                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

to the end of your char command.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Char not saving? Help please
